You

### Browser

Working

Ashburn

### [Cloudflare](https://www.cloudflare.com/5xx-error-landing?utm_source=errorcode_522&utm_campaign=common.io)

Working

common.io

### Host

Error

## What happened?

The initial connection between Cloudflare's network and the origin web server timed out. As a result, the web page can not be displayed.

## What can I do?

### If you're a visitor of this website:

Please try again in a few minutes.

### If you're the owner of this website:

Contact your hosting provider letting them know your web server is not completing requests. An Error 522 means that the request was able to connect to your web server, but that the request didn't finish. The most likely cause is that something on your server is hogging resources. [Additional troubleshooting information here.](https://developers.cloudflare.com/support/troubleshooting/http-status-codes/cloudflare-5xx-errors/error-522/)

Cloudflare Ray ID: **99ba5af728ece5be**‚Ä¢
Your IP:

# Community Guidelines

These are not hard and fast rules, merely guidelines to aid the human judgment of our community and keep this a clean and well-lighted place for civilized public discourse.

## This is a Civilized Place for Public Discussion

Please treat this discussion forum with the same respect you would a public park. We, too, are a shared community resource ‚Äî a place to share skills, knowledge, and interests through ongoing conversation.

The topics discussed here matter to us, and ‚Ä¶

Show More

[state.allinforsport.org](https://state.allinforsport.org/policies/proposals)

All In for Sport members can create [proposals](https://state.allinforsport.org/policies/proposals) to change the way the DAO governs itself. More proposal types (for new working groups (‚ÄúCELLS‚Äù), treasury allocation and other purposes will be introduced in the future. The governance team is available to assist all members in creating and submitting their proposals to DAO governance.

Follow these instructions to create a new proposal. You should also review the \[Proposal Standards\]( [https://stat](https://stat/)‚Ä¶

Proposal by the governance CELL to adopt the [initial DAO state](https://state.allinforsport.org/), [multisig safe](https://etherscan.io/address/0x8FA66238EB372E348AA4071aA8a52B7565384D75), [voting space](https://snapshot.org/#/allinforsport.eth), [discussion forum](https://discuss.allinforsport.org/) and [membership badges](https://polygonscan.com/address/0xeed76f3d0de104827357b37aa2f0ce3701e4ae28) for ongoing use as AIFS core infrastructure.

**Proposed by:** yeoro.eth, ananth.eth, rathermercu‚Ä¶

Show More

Upvotes

Include comments flagged as spam

[Shanny\_AIFS ¬†\\
\\
Moderator](https://common.xyz/profile/id/96265)

‚Ä¢

Edited 08/03/2023

Question re: quorum. If a proposal fails due to quorum not being reached, does it still need to wait 60 days to resubmit?

2

View upvotes

Share

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/129502)

‚Ä¢

Edited 08/03/2023

My sense would be no. If a quorum is not reached that is a failure of the governance process in general and not of the proposal specifically. If people don‚Äôt like a proposal they should be voting against it and not just not voting. So my thinking would be that it would be acceptable for someone to repost a proposal that didn‚Äôt achieve a quorum without having to wait the 60 days. If there is agreement on this we can update the governance docs to make this clear.
But [@rathermercurial.eth](https://common.xyz/all-in-for-sport/account/0x3FAD8Bcd2AEa732d02a203c156B19205253F2a06) you might have a different take on this.

2

View upvotes

Share

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/95002)

‚Ä¢

Edited 08/03/2023

A proposal which doesn‚Äôt meet quorum is considered ‚Äúinvalid‚Äù according to the Voting Policy rather than ‚Äúfailed‚Äù. The proposal can be re-submitted, though there may be some utility in changing or clarifying this in the future since failure to meet quorum might not be a result of governance failure (we can‚Äôt predict voter behavior around undesirable proposals, especially without private voting).

If multiple proposals fail to meet quorum, there‚Äôs a mechanism to circumvent quorum requirements in order to reduce the quorum parameter by no more than 10%.

2

View upvotes

Share

[MBaldwin ¬†\\
\\
Moderator](https://common.xyz/profile/id/96178)

‚Ä¢

Edited 08/03/2023

GM - thx for this pre-share process. I have heard UNA and TUNAA used and I believe it is a nonprofit structure but wonder if it is an acronym that can be spelled out for clarity. Fantastic work team!

2

View upvotes

Share

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/129502)

‚Ä¢

08/03/2023

Thanks [@MBaldwin](https://commonwealth.im/all-in-for-sport/account/0xfC46A9249F55616432C24eFC518bc21B22e25410), I have added a link into the proposal that points to the section of the governance state entitled DAO Overview. This provides a little more detail about the UNA/TUNAA structure. But let me know if there is more detail that you would like to know about it.

[https://state.allinforsport.org/org/overview](https://state.allinforsport.org/org/overview)

0

View upvotes

Share

Load replies

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/95002)

‚Ä¢

08/03/2023

The TUNAA is a form of operating agreement for UNA‚Äôs called the ‚ÄúTrustless Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Agreement. You can read more about it [here](https://docs.wrappr.wtf/how-to/non-profit/#non-profit).

0

View upvotes

Share

[Lewwwk ¬†\\
\\
Moderator](https://common.xyz/profile/id/96077)

‚Ä¢

09/03/2023

AISFIP -> AIFSIP :)

1

View upvotes

Share

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/129502)

‚Ä¢

14/03/2023

Ha! Nice catch [@Lewwwk](https://common.xyz/profile/id/93356). Fixed

0

View upvotes

Share

[Shanny\_AIFS ¬†\\
\\
Moderator](https://common.xyz/profile/id/96265)

‚Ä¢

08/03/2023

First sentence reads as this : As a result of undefinedundefinedÔªø, the Governance CELL, is this intentional?

0

View upvotes

Share

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/129502)

‚Ä¢

08/03/2023

Fixed. Thanks [@Shanny](https://common.xyz/all-in-for-sport/account/0x97f752e1d5F64CA932c32dBfF82f4c92710beE54), it now links to the original governance CELL proposal

0

View upvotes

[Anonymous ¬†\\
\\
Admin](https://common.xyz/profile/id/95002)

‚Ä¢

08/03/2023

Nice catch, thank you!!!
